metadata.name: Fall From Grace Boss Icons
metadata.description:
This mod adds [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2635267643]Enhanced Boss Bars[/url] icons for bosses from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2974704582]Fall From Grace[/url]
As of now, Boiler bosses are done, while Grotto are on the way.
Credits: Team Fallen Grace for creating Boiler and Grotto floors Wofsauge and Blind, the Bound Demon: for making Enhanced Boss Bars. quilennnn: for making [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2885452631]Revelations Boss Icons[/url] mod which was huge inspiration for this mod
